thread.title: Vin Diesel tears up as he honors Paul Walker at CinemaCon
thread.title_full: Vin Diesel tears up as he honors Paul Walker at CinemaCon

author: RACHEL DESANTIS
title: Vin Diesel tears up as he honors Paul Walker at CinemaCon
text:
Vin Diesel chokes back tears as he honors Paul Walker at CinemaCon Vin Diesel tears up as he honors Paul Walker at CinemaCon Vin Diesel teared up remembering his late friend and co-star Paul Walker. (Latour/Variety/REX/Shutterstock)  34 PM 
Four years later, Paul Walker's death is still a crying shame for his co-star and close friend Vin Diesel. 
Diesel choked back tears while paying tribute to his late pal and "Fast and Furious" co-star at CinemaCon in Las Vegas on Wednesday, Variety reports . 
Diesel told the crowd that the long-running action franchise's eighth chapter, next month's "The Fate of the Furious," was all thanks to Walker. 
"It was Paul Walker who promised eight," he said, before surprising the audience with the debut of the film in full. "It played over and over again in my head … Part of Paul's legacy lives through every frame that we shoot. You are reminded of this angel that was so integral to this concept of brotherhood for our millennium. There's something beautiful about that. There's something celebratory about that." Diesel and Walker starred together in the “Fast and Furious” franchise. (AP) 
Walker died in 2013 at the age of 40 following a fiery single-car crash in California. 
In 2015, Diesel honored his friendship with Walker by naming his daughter Pauline . 
"While I was in the hospital, the name that I will give you is … I named her … I named her Pauline," he said at the time. "There's no other person that I was thinking about as I was cutting this umbilical cord. I knew he was there and it felt like, you know, a way to keep his memory a part of my family and a part of my world."
